response.original_title: Jimmy Cricket: Pull Your Seats Forward
response.overview: JOIN JIMMY AT THE ROYAL COURT THEATRE IN BACUP, AS HE TAKES YOU ON A WHIMSICAL JOURNEY TO A LAND OF SIDE SPLITTING ONE LINERS. ALONG THE WAY HE’LL BE SINGING, DANCING AND READING “A LETTER FROM HIS MAMMY”. GET THE FAMILY AROUND BECAUSE ITS LAUGHTER FOR ALL AGES. RUNNING TIME: 70 MINS APPROX SPECIAL FEATURES RUNNING TIME: 25 MINS APPROX LANGUAGE: ENGLISH EXTRAS- MAMMY’S LETTER RAP CRICKET AND SON DON’T DO NOTHING THE JOKE I BORROWED FROM MILTON JONES MY KINDA TOWN(FEATURING THE MAYOR OF ROCHDALE) LET’S CELEBRATE THE DIFFERENCE BLOOPERS MY DRIVING TEST
response.title: Jimmy Cricket: Pull Your Seats Forward
